seo: 用友U8-CRM,任意文件上传漏洞,插件,漏洞检测
seo_en: Yonyou U8-CRM, arbitrary file upload vulnerability, plugin, vulnerability detection
summary: 该插件用于检测用友U8-CRM系统的任意文件上传漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求来验证是否存在漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file upload vulnerability in Yonyou U8-CRM system by sending a specific HTTP request to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
